name: Wheerl - wheeled robot motion library
short_description: The aim of this library is to provide a single place that includes an extensive set of ready-to-use motion algorithms for wheeled mobile robots, including motion planners, obstacle avoidance techniques, adaptive behaviors, trajectory generators, etc.
